items.name: Death's Embrace
items.desc: Increases the duration of Anti-Magic Shell by 100% and any damage it absorbs heals you.

items.name: Grip of the Everlasting
items.desc: For 3 sec after casting Death Grip, you may cast the spell a second time without regard for its cooldown.

items.name: Phearomones
items.desc: You and your minions gain 10% Haste while you are inside your Death and Decay and enemies damaged by your Death and Decay have a chance to cower in place for 3 sec.

items.name: Superstrain
items.desc: Your Frost Fever, Blood Plague, and Virulent Plague also apply the other two diseases at reduced effectiveness.

items.name: Bryndaor's Might
items.desc: Death Strike refunds 15% of Runic Power spent if it heals you for more than 10% of your maximum health.

items.name: Crimson Rune Weapon
items.desc: When a charge of Bone Shield is consumed, the cooldown of Dancing Rune Weapon is reduced by 30 sec. Additionally, when Dancing Rune Weapon fades, your Rune regeneration rate is increased by 40% for 10 sec.

items.name: Gorefiend's Domination
items.desc: Heart Strike reduces the remaining cooldown on Vampiric Blood by 2 seconds.

items.name: Vampiric Aura
items.desc: Your Vampiric Blood ability also affects all party members for 50% of the effect it has on you.

items.name: Absolute Zero
items.desc: Frostwyrm's Fury has 50% reduced cooldown and Freezes all enemies hit for 3 sec.

items.name: Biting Cold
items.desc: Remorseless Winter damage is increased byy 15%. The first time Remorseless Winter deals damage to 3 different enemies, you gain Rime.

items.name: Koltira's Favor
items.desc: Obliterate deals 10% increased damage and has a 15% chance to refund 2 runes.

items.name: placeholder
items.desc: aaa

items.name: Deadliest Coil
items.desc: Reduces the Runic Power cost of Death Coil by 10 and Death Coil increases the duration of Dark Transformation by 2 sec.

items.name: Death's Certainty
items.desc: Death Strike and Death Coil deal 10% increased damage and reduce the remaining cooldown of Defile or Death and Decay by 2.0 sec.

items.name: Frenzied Monstrosity
items.desc: Dark Transformation also increases the attack speed and damage of you and your Monstrosity by 20%.

items.name: Reanimated Shambler
items.desc: Your attacks have a chance to summon a Super Zombie that shambles forward and explodes, dealing (124% of Attack power) Shadow damage and applying a Festering Wound to 8 nearby enemies. 1.5 RPPM

items.name: Apexis Empowerment
items.desc: Metamorphosis increases your size, movement speed, and melee range by 100%.

items.name: Darkglare Medallion
items.desc: Eye Beam and Fel Devastation has a 20% chance to not incur its cooldown.

items.name: Fel Bombardment
items.desc: Immolation Aura damage has a chance to grant you a stack of Fel Bombardment, increasing the damage of your next Throw Glaive by 20% and launching an additional glaive at a nearby target. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

items.name: Sigil of the Illidari
items.desc: Casting [ Eye Beam][ Fel Devastation] summons an allied [Vengeance][Havoc] Demon Hunter who casts [ Fel Devastation][ Eye Beam].

items.name: Chaos Theory
items.desc: Blade Dance has a 10% chance to grant you Chaotic Blades, increasing the damage of Chaos Strike by 25% and its chance to refund Fury by an additional 60% for 8 sec.

items.name: Darkest Hour
items.desc: You automatically trigger Darkness when you fall below 35% health. This effect can only occur once every 2 min.

items.name: Erratic Fel Core
items.desc: The cooldown of Fel Rush is reduced by 30%.

items.name: Inner Demons
items.desc: Chaos Strike has a chance to unleash your inner demon, causing it to crash into your target and deal (136.5% of Attack power) Chaos damage to all nearby enemies.

items.name: Fiery Soul
items.desc: Each Soul Fragment consumed by Soul Cleave reduces the cooldown of Fiery Brand by 2 sec.

items.name: Razelikh's Defilement
items.desc: Soul Cleave reduces the remaining cooldown on a random Sigil by 8 sec.

items.name: Cloak of Fel Flames
items.desc: You take 15% reduced magic damage while Immolation Aura is active.

items.name: Spirit of the Darkness Flame
items.desc: Your Fiery Brand now heals you for 100% of the damage done and each enemy hit by your Sigil of Flame increases the instant damage of your next Fiery Brand by 15%, stacking up to 15 times.

items.name: Druid Runecarve 1
items.desc: Effects of Thick Hide, Astral Influence, Feline Swiftness, and Ysera's Gift increased by 75%. When you shift into your Affinity's form, you gain Heart of the Wild for 10 sec, once every 1 min.

items.name: Druid Runecarve 3
items.desc: Your damage over time effects deal their damage in 25% less time and your healing over time effects occur in 15% less time.

items.name: Druid Runecarve 4
items.desc: When Moonfire, Rake, Rip, or Rejuvenation are on a single target, their effects are increased 30%.

items.name: Lycara's Fleeting Glimpse
items.desc: Every 45 sec while in combat, cast a spell based on your form: (1) No Form: Wild Growth; (2) Cat Form: Primal Wrath; (3) Bear Form: Barkskin; (4) Moonkin Form: Starfall; (5) Travel Form: Stampeding Roar

items.name: Oneth's Clear Vision
items.desc: Starsurge and Starfall each have a 15% chance to make the other free.

items.name: Primordial Arcanic Pulsar
items.desc: Every 400 Astral Power spent grants Celestial Alignment for 9 sec.

items.name: Druid Balance Runecarve 3
items.desc: Entering Eclipse increases your critical strike chance with Arcane or Nature spells by 105%, decreasing by 15% every sec.

items.name: Timeworn Dreamcatcher
items.desc: Starsurge and Starfall reduce the cost of Starsurge and Starfall 10% for 5 sec, stacking up to 2 times.

items.name: Apex Predator's Craving
items.desc: Rip damage has a 4% chance to make your next Ferocious Bite free and deal the maximum damage.

items.name: Druid Feral Runecarve 4
items.desc: Combo point-generating abilities reduce the cooldown of [Incarnation: King of the Jungle][Berserk] by 0.2 sec. During [Incarnation: King of the Jungle][Berserk], they cause the target to bleed for an additonal 50% of their damage over 8 sec.

items.name: Druid Feral Runecarve 2
items.desc: Tiger's Fury causes your next finishing move to restore 3 combo points.

items.name: Druid Feral Runecarve 1
items.desc: Clearcast abilities generate 25% of their Energy cost, and your maximum energy is increased by 60.

items.name: Druid Guardian Runecarve 1
items.desc: Thrash has 20% increased damage, 30% increased radius, and can stack 1 additional time.

items.name: Druid Guardian Runecarve 2
items.desc: Barkskin reduces damage by an additional 15%. When it begins and ends, you gain Ironfur and Frenzied Regeneration.

items.name: Druid Guardian Runecarve 3
items.desc: In Bear Form, Thrash has a 15% chance to trigger an additional Thrash.

items.name: Legacy of the Sleeper
items.desc: Berserk in Bear Form grants 25% increased damage, 15% Leech, and immunity to effects that cause loss of control of your character.

items.name: Memory of the Mother Tree
items.desc: Wild Growth has a 25% chance to cause your next Rejuvenation or Regrowth to apply to 2 additional allies within 20 yards of the target.

items.name: The Dark Titan's Lesson
items.desc: You may Lifebloom two targets at once, and Lifebloom's final healing is increased by 100%.

items.name: Druid Resto Runecarve 3
items.desc: Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 10 sec.

items.name: Druid Resto Runecarve 4
items.desc: Rejuvenation healing has a 2% chance to create a new Rejuvenation on a nearby target.
